lead_paragraph: Belgium's injured forward Eden Hazard, outstanding in the win over Hungary, missed training again on Wednesday and has not yet been cleared for the Euro 2016 quarter-final against Wales, coach Marc Wilmots said.

headline.print_headline: Belgium's Hazard Misses Training Again Before Wales Match
headline.main: Belgium's Hazard Misses Training Again Before Wales Match
